category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MECTCompareAssignmentsFavorite
preference.preference_description: Defines which Accountability Check Favorite is to be used to compare assignments in the Change Tracker. Value can be of any of the below two forms : a) <uid>:<Favorite name> b) <uid> where uid is the UID of the dataset and Favorite name is the name of the favorite.
